bug.author: TheSilvandre
bug.description:
Describe the bug On the Installation.md file there are a few typos. To Reproduce Where to find the typos:
Go to https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/ml-agents/blob/master/docs/Installation.md#package-installation Scroll down to the second paragraph ("To install the Barrcuda") See errors ("Barrcuda" and "Adavanced")
Screenshots Screenshot of the location of the typos: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9055613/72648809-e7ba7400-3973-11ea-9c34-4a040a1e8c7a.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Thanks for your report. Those are my typos. Iâ€™ll fix them quick. Thanks ðŸ˜‚
Fixes have been merged into master. I will close this now. Thank you again for your feedback.
